long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds features to Knockout.chat

Adds a box for custom CSS to your user profile page.  Adds classes to the body of each page to support page specific styling.  All classes include 'lbko' to allow for stylings that won't conflict with the native stylings.

Page will refresh on CSS save to apply the new code and wipe the old from the injected stylesheets.  Supports saving CSS with Ctrl + S while focused on the CSS box.

Saves custom CSS in local storage, not the sync storage.  This means it sticks with your current browser and wont follow you across devices.  This is to allow for more styling, as the limit for sync storage is much smaller than local.

Sorts subscriptions feed by most recent post, can be toggled on/off in the extension's options page.

Very WIP, more features planned.
